name: Mad Princess: The Great Gladiators
description: Choose your own path in this gladiator role-playing game. The player starts off as an incarcerated criminal, forced to fight for their life. After they leave the prison, they will embark on a journey to sharpen their skills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows2000, XP, Vista, Windows7, 8, 10 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
